trans-unit.source:
\n

The exception that is thrown when the value of an argument is outside the allowable range of values as defined by the invoked method.

\n
trans-unit.target: $x$x$Xxx xxxxxxxxx xxxx xx xxxxxx xxxx xxx xxxxx xx xx xxxxxxxx xx xxxxxxx xxx xxxxxxxxx xxxxx xx xxxxxx xx xxxxxxx xx xxx xxxxxxx xxxxxx.$$x$$x

trans-unit.source:
\n

The name of the parameter that causes this exception.
trans-unit.target: $x$x$Xxx xxxx xx xxx xxxxxxxxx xxxx xxxxxx xxxx xxxxxxxxx.

trans-unit.source:
\n

The error message that explains the reason for this exception.
trans-unit.target: $x$x$Xxx xxxxx xxxxxxx xxxx xxxxxxxx xxx xxxxxx xxx xxxx xxxxxxxxx.

trans-unit.source:
\n

The exception that is the cause of the current exception, or a null reference (Nothing in Visual Basic) if no inner exception is specified.
trans-unit.target: $x$x$Xxx xxxxxxxxx xxxx xx xxx xxxxx xx xxx xxxxxxx xxxxxxxxx$ xx x xxxx xxxxxxxxx $$xxxxxx$Xxxxxxx$$xxxxxx$ xx Xxxxxx Xxxxx$ xx xx xxxxx xxxxxxxxx xx xxxxxxxxx.

trans-unit.source:
\n

The name of the parameter that caused the exception.
trans-unit.target: $x$x$Xxx xxxx xx xxx xxxxxxxxx xxxx xxxxxx xxx xxxxxxxxx.

trans-unit.source:
\n

The value of the argument that causes this exception.
trans-unit.target: $x$x$Xxx xxxxx xx xxx xxxxxxxx xxxx xxxxxx xxxx xxxxxxxxx.

trans-unit.source:
\n

The name of the parameter that caused the exception.
trans-unit.target: $x$x$Xxx xxxx xx xxx xxxxxxxxx xxxx xxxxxx xxx xxxxxxxxx.

trans-unit.source:
\n

Gets the argument value that causes this exception.

\n
trans-unit.target: $x$x$Xxxx xxx xxxxxxxx xxxxx xxxx xxxxxx xxxx xxxxxxxxx.$$x$$x

trans-unit.source:
\n

Gets the error message and the string representation of the invalid argument value, or only the error message if the argument value is null.

\n
trans-unit.target: $x$x$Xxxx xxx xxxxx xxxxxxx xxx xxx xxxxxx xxxxxxxxxxxxxx xx xxx xxxxxxx xxxxxxxx xxxxx$ xx xxxx xxx xxxxx xxxxxxx xx xxx xxxxxxxx xxxxx xx xxxx.$$x$$x

trans-unit.source:
The value of this property takes one of two forms, as follows.

Condition

Value

The actualValue is null.
trans-unit.target: Xxx xxxxx xx xxxx xxxxxxxx xxxxx xxx xx xxx xxxxx$ xx xxxxxxx.$$x$$x$x$Xxxxxxxxx $$x$$x$x$Xxxxx $$x$$x$xxxxx$$xxxxx$$xx$$xx$$x$x$Xxx $xx$xxxxxxXxxxx$$xx$ xx $xxxxxx$xxxx$$xxxxxx$.

trans-unit.source:
\n\n

The message string appended with the string representation of the invalid argument value.
trans-unit.target: $$x$$x$$xx$$xx$$x$x$Xxx $xx$xxxxxxx$$xx$ xxxxxx xxxxxxxx xxxx xxx xxxxxx xxxxxxxxxxxxxx xx xxx xxxxxxx xxxxxxxx xxxxx.
